ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Week of War
ygData.msgSnippet: Couple of guildies were in a war, good against evil. GM recruited people in EC and ported them away to the karanas. Multi group killing, they were in the evil
ygData.messageBody:
Couple of guildies were in a war, good against evil. GM recruited people in
EC and ported them away to the karanas. Multi group killing, they were in
the evil team.

Another guildie was in a Firiona Vie defending assault against dark races.
So small events popped up here and there.



-----Original Message-----
From: bigmaca3 [mailto:bigmaca3@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 18, 2002 12:56 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Week of War


Has anyone seen or heard of any events going on for this? I remember
around the time Stormhammer was opened they had a week of adventure.
I could get into a war!

Tuldayen Grimblade
36th season Ranger of Tunare
Terris-Thule



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
